column4: Hey there.  I'm going to be making the full switch to ubuntu once 10.04 is released, and I had some questions...
I've got an acer laptop with AMD64 dual core, and I know there's 32 bit, and 64 bit versions.  Is the best option to get 64 bit or does it have any drawbacks?
there used to be some software that wasn't available in 64bit.. but that is much better now
